metadata.description: SynopsisToronto's got a new superhero! And he's pitiful!Lucas Barrett is a 9-5 office lackey during the day and a struggling superhero on evenings and weekends. He's also broke.While his job salary is not enough to support his crime-fighting hobby, Lucas finds an alternate plan that may heighten his superhero status.
metadata.name: Pitiful Human-Lizard
